original_title: Le bruit, l'odeur et quelques étoiles
overview: This "documentary opera" retraces the events that shook the suburbs of Toulouse at the end of 1998. Caught red-handed stealing a car, young Habib, also known as Pipo, was shot at point-blank range by a police officer. Serious riots ensued, pitting gangs of young people against the police for several days.
title: Le bruit, l'odeur et quelques étoiles
